title: The Fourth Industrial Revolution and Future Mathematics Education: Competency Development Through Online Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment combining 4th Industrial Revolution core technologies with mathematical thinking. Mandatory use of digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the interconnections between Fourth Industrial Revolution technologies (AI, big data) and mathematical concepts.
Learners can complete team-based data analysis projects using online collaborative tools.
Learners can systematically document and present mathematical problem-solving processes in digital environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
